sentences.en: A whoop hoop house is basically a metal frame covered with plastic or other all - weather material.
sentences.cn: 拱形温室是由金属加上覆盖塑料膜或其他 全天候 材料组成.

sentences.en: Back in the White House, I let out a whoop of joy, and relief.
sentences.cn: 回到白宫后, 我发出了一声兴奋的欢呼, 松了一口气.

sentences.en: conventioneers whooping it up for their candidate.
sentences.cn: 与会人员为他们的侯选人欢呼

sentences.en: Every spring they whoop it up for the circus.
sentences.cn: 每年春天他们都要替马戏团大加宣传.

sentences.en: Everybody is planning to whoop it up this weekend.
sentences.cn: 大家都打算在这个周末好好欢闹一番.

sentences.en: He gave a whoop of joy when he saw his new bicycle.
sentences.cn: 他看到自己的新自行车时,高兴得叫了起来.

sentences.en: He later a whoop of joy as he approached a microphone to address the crowd.
sentences.cn: 在对着麦克风要向观众讲话前,他发出了兴奋的叫喊.

sentences.en: Let's go to the party and whoop it up.
sentences.cn: 咱们去参加晚会,狂欢一下吧.

sentences.en: Let's whoop it up -- the boss is gone!
sentences.cn: 我们放松一下吧, 老板出去了!

sentences.en: No, no. It was a whoop, whoop, whoop ! - How about this: Whoosh! - Yikes! Who said that?
sentences.cn: 不, 不. 是呜噗, 呜噗, 呜噗!-这个怎么样: 呜嘘! - 恶心! 谁说的?

sentences.en: Pump your fist in the air and go Whoop Whoop!
sentences.cn: 帮浦你的拳头空中和去兴奋的叫兴奋的叫!

sentences.en: Scattered groans and whoops broke out in the crowd.
sentences.cn: 人群中发出零星的懊恼声和欢呼声。

sentences.en: The results showed that well - managed whoop hoop houses can grow high - quality crops.
sentences.cn: 结果显示,管理良好的拱形温室能产出高质量的农作物.

sentences.en: The rugby team likes to whoop it up after a match, especially if they win.
sentences.cn: 这个橄榄球队喜欢赛后欢闹庆祝一番, 特别是如果他们获胜的话.

sentences.en: The war whoop of the American Indian was bloodcurdling.
sentences.cn: 美洲印第安人的作战喊杀声使人毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: These are the little air - guns which contribute to make the ice crack and whoop.
sentences.cn: 溶冰爆裂有声,全是这些小气泡干的花样.

sentences.en: Who dares whoop it up here?

words.tran_cn: 高喊者；狂欢的人；咳嗽者
大叫；哮喘声；呐喊；一点点

phrases.tran_cn: (美，非正式，旧)漠不关心，一点也不在乎
大肆宣扬，捧场：表达激情，激起热情；欢呼

trans.tran_cn: 大叫，呐喊，喘息声，哮喘声
